title: Elmira boy killed in accidental shooting
content:
A 12-year-old boy was killed in Elmira this weekend in an accidental shooting, Elmira police said this morning.
Police were called to a West Hudson Street residence at around 6:50 p.m. Saturday after someone reported hearing a single gunshot.
The boy was dead when police arrived.
Police say the person holding the gun did not believe it was loaded.
The investigation is continuing. Police said they will not identify the parties involved.
